attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: this is so people can be moved around the country,ie,poole 2 bournemouthand northern councils thus reducing the waiting lists and filling up the other councils empty properties,therefore these do not fall into disrepair and sqauting,there r more available properties in northern areas than here in the south.for example poole talks to grimsby,local council pays for the move thus reducing the waiting lists
